mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOCAL_PCIMAGE (id, attachment, uri, CREATED_TIME, cardid, userid ) VALUES( #{id}, #{attachment}, #{uri}, #{createdTime}, #{cardid}, #{userId} )
mapper.select: select b.*,s.display_name as displayName from BASIC_CUSTOMER_PCINFORMATION b,sys_user s where b.userid=#{userId} and b.userid=s.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASIC_CUSTOMER_PCINFORMATION (id, name, csrq, cjsj, cardid, sfzdz, hy, dpdz, userid ) VALUES( #{id}, #{name}, #{csrq}, #{cjsj}, #{cardid}, #{sfzdz}, #{hy}, #{dpdz}, #{userid} )
mapper.select: select amp.user_id as id FROM manager_belong_map mbm LEFT JOIN account_manager_parameter amp on amp.id = mbm.child_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = amp.user_id WHERE mbm.parent_id ='100000'

select amp.user_id as id FROM manager_belong_map mbm ,account_manager_parameter amp
, sys_user su, ( select id from account_manager_parameter where user_id=#{id}) cc
WHERE mbm.parent_id =cc.id and amp.id = mbm.child_id and su.id = amp.user_id

select s.display_name as name,s.id as userid from sys_dept_user sd,sys_user s, (select t.id from sys_department t where t.id in (select tt.dept_id from sys_dept_user tt,sys_user su where tt.user_id = su.id and su.id=#{userId}))t where t.id=sd.dept_id and sd.user_id=s.id
